attributes.additional_details:
WHY? 
humans with ptsd dread every bonfire night and New Year’s Eve due to the sale of fireworks,  not to mention the poor defenceless animals that can’t speak or calm themselves down,   From horses and sheep in fields,  to dogs at home,   It’s heartbreaking watching your pets nearly have a heart attack due to the noises of fireworks,   We aren’t saying ban them,   We are just asking PLEASE MAKE THEM SOUNDLESS!
attributes.background: Ideally  the sale of fireworks to the general public banned,  now if we can’t ban people from buying them, we can at least SILENCE all fireworks!  There’s no need for the noise,  people go to watch the pretty fireworks in the sky not the explosive sounds that come with it!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for the same action:

Ban the sale of all non-silent fireworks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649354
